# [Interview #1084: Ask the Author: Brandon Sanderson, Entry #49](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1084#49)

#### Question

You said that Shallan will have different apprenticeships, we know 2, will Hoid be another?

#### Brandon Sanderson

RAFO. :)
